author: Opentrons
description:
This protocol automates a nucleic acid purification for the LGC Sbeadex Plant Maxi Kit using the Opentrons Magnetic Module and Opentrons Temperature Module
If you have any questions about this protocol, please email our Applications Engineering team at protocols@opentrons.com.


To purchase tips, reagents, or pipettes, please visit our online store or contact our sales team at info@opentrons.com

Opentrons OT-2
Opentrons Magnetic Module
Opentrons P300 Multi-Channel Pipette, GEN2
Opentrons Tips
NEST 1-Well Reservoir, 195mL
Reagents (magnetic beads, ethanol, elution buffer)




Slot 1: Magnetic Module + NEST 96 Deep Well Plate
Slot 2: SPEX 96 Well Plate
Slot 3: Temperature Module + Elution Plate
Slot 4: Lysis Buffer
Slot 5: Binding Buffer
Slot 6: Elution Buffer
Slot 7: Wash 1 Buffer
Slot 8: Wash 2 Buffer
Slots 9-11: Opentrons 300 uL Tips

markdown.author: [Opentrons](https://opentrons.com/)
markdown.categories:
* Nucleic Acid Extraction & Purification
	* Nucleic Acid Extraction
markdown.description:
This protocol automates a nucleic acid purification for the LGC Sbeadex Plant Maxi Kit using the [Opentrons Magnetic Module](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/hardware-modules/products/magdeck) and [Opentrons Temperature Module](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/hardware-modules/products/tempdeck)</br>

If you have any questions about this protocol, please email our Applications Engineering team at [protocols@opentrons.com](mailto:protocols@opentrons.com).

---
![Materials Needed](https://s3.amazonaws.com/opentrons-protocol-library-website/custom-README-images/001-General+Headings/materials.png)

To purchase tips, reagents, or pipettes, please visit our [online store](https://shop.opentrons.com/) or contact our sales team at [info@opentrons.com](mailto:info@opentrons.com)

* [Opentrons OT-2](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/ot-2-robot/products/ot-2)
* [Opentrons Magnetic Module](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/hardware-modules/products/magdeck)
* [Opentrons P300 Multi-Channel Pipette, GEN2](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/ot-2-pipettes/products/8-channel-electronic-pipette)
* [Opentrons Tips](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/opentrons-tips)
* [NEST 1-Well Reservoir, 195mL](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/verified-labware/products/nest-1-well-reservoir-195-ml)
* Reagents (magnetic beads, ethanol, elution buffer)

---
![Setup](https://s3.amazonaws.com/opentrons-protocol-library-website/custom-README-images/001-General+Headings/Setup.png)

* Slot 1: Magnetic Module + NEST 96 Deep Well Plate
* Slot 2: SPEX 96 Well Plate
* Slot 3: Temperature Module + Elution Plate
* Slot 4: Lysis Buffer
* Slot 5: Binding Buffer
* Slot 6: Elution Buffer
* Slot 7: Wash 1 Buffer
* Slot 8: Wash 2 Buffer
* Slots 9-11: Opentrons 300 uL Tips
markdown.notes: If you have any questions about this protocol, please contact the Protocol Development Team by filling out the [Troubleshooting Survey](https://protocol-troubleshooting.paperform.co/).
markdown.process:
1. Choose your pipette mount location and download your protocol bundle.
2. Upload [custom labware definition](https://support.opentrons.com/en/articles/3136506-using-labware-in-your-protocols), if needed.
3. Upload your protocol into the [OT App](https://opentrons.com/ot-app).
4. Set up your deck according to the deck map.
5. Calibrate your labware, tipracks, and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our [support articles](https://support.opentrons.com/en/collections/1559720-guide-for-getting-started-with-the-ot-2).
6. Hit "Run".
markdown.title: LGC Sbeadex Plant Maxi Kit Nucleic Acid Extraction

notes: If you have any questions about this protocol, please contact the Protocol Development Team by filling out the Troubleshooting Survey.

title: LGC Sbeadex Plant Maxi Kit Nucleic Acid Extraction
